name: Frozen Depths
description:
Frozen Depths is a singleplayer, narrative-driven puzzle game. 

Play as Dr. Fabio; a scientist in search of a cure for a strange illness plaguing the world. Discover a powerful tool and use it to melt and create ice throughout the vast caves of Antarctica.

Explore the long forgotten civilisation that made these caves their home. Use your handy detector device and find the antidote. Melt away frozen barriers and craft sturdy bridges of ice to traverse your surroundings. Brave these frozen depths and save the world!
